mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.nikename AS "nikename", a.birthday AS "birthday", a.zodiac AS "zodiac", a.sex AS "sex", a.moblie AS "moblie", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM me_contacts a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.moblie LIKE '%'||#{moblie}||'%' '%'+#{moblie}+'%' concat('%',#{moblie},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO me_contacts( id, name, nikename, birthday, zodiac, sex, moblie, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{nikename}, #{birthday}, #{zodiac}, #{sex}, #{moblie}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE me_contacts SET name = #{name}, nikename = #{nikename}, birthday = #{birthday}, zodiac = #{zodiac}, sex = #{sex}, moblie = #{moblie}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
